message:
People have sent in about a dozen suggestions for a story that originated with David Booth. Sites are getting punked left and right with this.

DISINFO ALERT: "The source for the CIA Spy Captured Giving Nuclear Bomb To Terrorists story is David Booth who perpetuates hoaxes on the Internet under the name, 'Sorcha Faal.'"

http://cryptogon.com/?p=20740
